description: Very flexible metallic mineral, dull to bright silvery green in color. Can be mixed with Tritanium to make extremely hard alloys or it can be used by itself for various purposes. Fairly common in most regions. May be obtained by reprocessing the following ores and their variations: High security status star systems: Pyroxeres, Plagioclase Low security status star systems: Pyroxeres, Kernite, Jaspet, Gneiss, Dark Ochre, Crokite Null security status star systems: Pyroxeres, Kernite, Bistot, Arkonor Wormhole systems: Pyroxeres, Kernite, Gneiss, Bistot, Arkonor
name: Mexallon
